text: Here again, no complications for either mother or child related to the general anesthesia were also described.The three patients with LN involvement died from recurrence of the disease.Seven patients out of eight reached fetal maturity (28 to 36 weeks of gestation) and gave birth by cesarean section to healthy babies.
